betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Dosimeter§r is an instrument for detecting radiation and assessing radioactive contamination.

It is functionally similar to a §6Geiger Counter§r, but it collects much less data - only the general radiation contamination of the environment. Only a handheld version of the dosimeter is available. To obtain radiation information, right-click while holding the dosimeter.

Like a counter, it makes a characteristic crackling sound when radiation is detected.

§2The maximum radiation displayed is 3.6 RAD/S.

Not great, not terrible.
